snippet.title: On What Date is the LHC gonna start this month?
What is the name of that weird scientific project that everyone thinks is going to blow up the whole universe?
snippet.description: It's like a particle accelerator or something, anyone know what the hell I'm talking about here?

snippet.title: I am conCERNed about the hadron collider..what is going on here?
snippet.description: ... to open up the long awaited 'eye of terror' warp space rift: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eye_of_Terror
